text: Susan Lenox (Her Fall and Rise) is a 1931 American drama movie directed by Robert Z. Leonard and was based on the 1912 novel of the same name by David Graham Phillips. It stars Greta Garbo, Clark Gable, Alan Hale Sr., Jean Hersholt, Hilda Vaughn, Ian Keith, John Miljan and was distributed by Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1931 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Robert Z. Leonard
title: Susan Lenox (Her Fall and Rise)
